author: Football Italia staff
title: Cellino: 'I have COVID-19'
description: Brescia President Massimo Cellino confirms he has contracted the coronavirus, along with his daughter. “I felt excessively tired and pain in my bones.”
content:
Brescia President Massimo Cellino confirms he has contracted the coronavirus, along with his daughter. “I felt excessively tired and pain in my bones.”
The reports emerged in Sardegna 1 this evening that Cellino had tested positive for antibodies, suggesting… [+1033 chars]
